column2: SELECT p.ra,p.dec,p.u,p.g,p.r,p.i,p.z,   (#-abs(((p.g-g_target)-((p.r-r_target)))/@col_lim))*(#-abs(((p.r-r_target)-((p.i-i_target)))/@col_lim)) as rating  FROM PhotoObj AS p     WHERE     ( 	p.ra BETWEEN (@point_ra-@fov_ra)  AND (@point_ra+@fov_ra) 	AND p.dec BETWEEN (@point_dec-@fov) AND (@point_dec+@fov) 	) AND  	( 	((p.status & #)!=#)  	AND ((p.flags & #)!=#)  	AND ((p.flags & #)=#)  	AND (p.type = #)  	) AND  	( 	p.r BETWEEN (@r_target-@mag_limit) AND (@r_target+@mag_limit) 	)  AND  	( 		(p.g - p.r) BETWEEN ((@g_target-@r_target)-@col_limit)AND((@g_target-@r_target)+@col_limit) 	AND 		(p.r - p.i) BETWEEN ((@r_target-@i_target)-@col_limit)AND((@r_target-@i_target)+@col_limit) 	)
